thread.title: Great Hotel near Beacon Theater at resonable cost

author: nkAverillPark
title: Great Hotel near Beacon Theater at resonable cost
text: Perfect location on upper West Side. Walking distance to Beacon, Central Park, Museums, Zabars.Room was normal size for NY hotel but very clean, very comfortable bed, very quiet. Great value!Great shower!
